name: The Russian Doll
description:
This game launches in fullscreen, to get rid of the windows or mac bar, just maximise your window (shortcut F11) and then the blue maximise button in the bottom right hand corner.

The Russian Doll is the sibling game of The Remains of Richard Fletcher. If you enjoyed this, give the other one a go.

Overview

The Russian Doll is a narrative detective game built for Brackeys 2020 Game Jam -theme 'Rewind'.  

How it fits the theme

I took a rather liberal approach to this theme and so came to it from the place of rewinding and poring over tapes. There is also a rewind to a former time, with the possibility of rewinding history. So there you go.

Credits:

Code, Music - Tim Sheinman (Owl_Skip)

Art - Daniel Duke, Tim Sheinman

Voice Work - Gem Andrews, David Bramwell, Daniel Duke, Tim Sheinman
